title: spigot1.7x-1.8x版本崩溃
author: 幻若浅梦
txt_content:
这里是报错信息[16:56:21 警告]: **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!
[16:56:21 警告]: The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.
[16:56:21 警告]: While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
[16:56:21 警告]: To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.

replies.author: DustSettles
replies.txt_content:
幻若浅梦 发表于 2016-1-15 20:50
是authme?
应该跟插件无关，直接换个服务端就好了

replies.author: DustSettles
replies.txt_content: UUID转换失败，应该换个服务端就好了，去官网下一个吧
